name: Subscription Searcher
description: Application that allows you to search for movies and TV shows and check which streaming services they are available on. Uses TMDB API to fetch content information and available streaming services.
architecture: Communicates with TMDB API via Next.js App Router + Server Actions. Debounces search input by 300ms with use-debounce to reduce API calls. Manages search queries with URL parameters (useSearchParams) to maintain search state on page reload. Abstracts external API calls with Server Actions for unified error handling. Uses TMDB API's multi search endpoint, filtering only movies and TV shows. Retrieves streaming service information for Japan (results.JP.flatrate).
features: Movie and TV show search functionality (TMDB multi search API)
Search results list display (with poster images, Next.js Image optimization)
Content detail pages (synopsis, rating, first air date, etc.)
Display of streaming services available in Japan (JP.flatrate)
URL parameter management for search queries (useSearchParams)
Message display when no search results
